## Exponential distribution
```{r}
expo <- function(lambda){
  u <-runif(1)
  s <- -log(1-u)/lambda # -log(u) should be sufficient
}
```

```{r}
n <- 1000
lambda <- 3

sample <- vector(length = n)

for (i in 1:n){
  sample[i] <- expo(lambda)
}

hist(sample)
```

## Uniform Distribution
```{r}
unif <- function(a, b){
  u <- runif(1)
  s <- a + (b - a)*u
}
```

```{r}
n <- 1000
a <- 0
b <- 7

sample <- vector(length = n)

for (i in 1:n){
  sample[i] <- unif(a, b)
}

hist(sample)
```


## Weibull Distribution

```{r}
weib <- function(alpha, beta){
  u <- runif(1)
  s <- alpha*(-log(1-u))^(1/beta)
}
```

```{r}
n <- 1000
alpha <- 5
beta <- 9

sample <- vector(length = n)

for (i in 1:n){
  sample[i] <- weib(alpha, beta)
}

hist(sample)
```

## Triangular Distribution

```{r}
trian <- function(){
  u <- runif(1)
  if (u <= 0.5){
    s <- sqrt(2 * u)
  }
  else{
    s <- 2 - sqrt(2*(1 - u))
  }
}
```

```{r}
n <- 1000

sample <- vector(length = n)

for (i in 1:n){
  sample[i] <- trian()
}

hist(sample)
```
